definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

sentences.english: The magnetic-levitation train ride from the international airport to the city is the perfect metaphor for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 从国际机场到市区的磁悬浮列车线是上海的最佳名片。

sentences.english: We may ride the magnetic suspension train to go to the Pudong international airport.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以乘磁悬浮列车去浦东国际机场。

sentences.english: You can take the maglev train at Pudong Airport.
sentences.chinese: 你可以从浦东国际机场乘坐磁悬浮列车。

sentences.english: Turnout is an important part of maglev.
sentences.chinese: 道岔是磁悬浮线路的重要部件。

sentences.english: The radial stiffness of magnetic bearings composed of only two permanent magnet rings is limited.
sentences.chinese: 由双磁环组成的永磁磁悬浮轴承的径向刚度很有限。

sentences.english: Mag-lev ball system is a typical nonlinear, open-loop unstable system.
sentences.chinese: 磁悬浮系统是一个典型的开环不稳定的非线性系统。

sentences.english: Take the Shanghai Maglev Train from Pudong International Airport to the Lujiazui financial district.
sentences.chinese: 从浦东国际机场乘坐磁悬浮列车到陆家嘴金融区。

sentences.english: Application of the magnetic suspension numerical controled tensioner in textile production is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了纺织生产中采用的磁悬浮数控张力器。

sentences.english: Magnetic suspension switched reluctance motor has combined characteristics of synchronous motor and magnetic bearing.
sentences.chinese: 磁悬浮开关磁阻电机结合了同步电机和磁轴承的优点。

sentences.english: The study of AMB control algorithm has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 开展了磁悬浮轴承控制系统的控制算法研究。

sentences.english: Superconducting maglev vehicle is one of the most promising applications of HTS bulks.
sentences.chinese: 超导磁悬浮列车是高温超导块材最有前景的应用之一。

sentences.english: Magnetically levitated vibration isolation(MLVI) is a new technology of active vibration isolation. this first paper gives a general explanation of MLVI.
sentences.chinese: 磁悬浮隔振是一种新型的主动式隔振技术。

sentences.english: China built a high-speed maglev in Shanghai at cost of 9 billion RMB back then.
sentences.chinese: 中国在上海以90亿人民币建造了一条高速磁悬浮。

sentences.english: We can take the Maglev train to Pudong International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以乘磁悬浮列车去浦东国际机场。

sentences.english: Guideway inspection is very important to keep safe in maglev train running.
sentences.chinese: 轨道梁检测是磁悬浮列车安全运行的重要保证。

sentences.english: That leit is like train of magnetism in suspension in sky travel.
sentences.chinese: 乐，它就像在天空旅行磁悬浮列车。

definition: light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
